name: "The Ranch": Part Three Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who took over running Maggie's after Maggie decided to leave town for a while in "Can't Be Really Gone"?
questions.explanation:
Rooster.

	Maggie decided she wanted to travel so she gave the bar to Rooster for him to run and the two of them would share the profits.

questions.text: What singer did Colt brag about that he once met at a Dairy Queen in "Last Dollar (Fly Away)"?
questions.explanation:
Kenny Chesney.

	Colt told everyone that he met Kenny Chesney at a Dairy Queen and the singer bought him a Moo-latte.

questions.text: In "My Next Thirty Years", who did Colt tell first about the baby he and Heather were going to have?
questions.explanation:
Rooster.

	While at midnight mass, Colt told Rooster about Heather having a baby while they were lighting a candle for their grandmother Bennett. Rooster thought that was in poor taste since she died in a fire.

questions.text: In "She'll Have You Back", Abby told Colt that she put a cigarette out on all their high school pictures but one after she found out about Colt and Heather's baby. Which picture did she leave alone?
questions.explanation:
Homecoming picture.

	After learning that Heather was keeping the baby, Colt returned home to find Abby on his porch smoking cigarettes. Angrily, Abby informed Colt that she put a cigarette out on their winter formal picture and their prom picture, but not their homecoming picture because her hair looked really good in it.

questions.text: How did Colt, Rooster and Umberto wind up in jail and Umberto deported in "My Best Friend"?
questions.correct: They were in a bar fight
options: All three of them were pulled over for DUI
Colt was driving the tractor on the main road again
They were arrested for disturbing the peace
questions.explanation:
They were in a bar fight.

	Rooster and Umberto skipped work to go ice fishing with Abby and Colt. When Rooster got angry about having to go back to work, he took off for a bar. Colt and Umberto went after him. They ended up getting into a bar fight when Rooster went after the guys that made some rude remarks about Umberto. After all three were arrested, Billy Tompkins told them that Umberto was to be deported since he was in the States illegally.

questions.text: While going to get a beer at the hunting cabin, what did Rooster find living in the refrigerator in "Things Change"?
questions.explanation:
Mouse.

	After Mary threw Rooster out for keeping Heather's pregnancy a secret from her, Maggie gave Rooster the hunting cabin she got in the divorce. Rooster went to get a beer out of the refrigerator and slammed the door shut when he saw a mouse.

questions.text: While opening the bar with Hank in "Take Me Away From Here", what did Maggie find had happened when she walked into the bar?
options: Colt and Rooster were passed out drunk on the bar
questions.explanation:
Bar was flooding.

	Hank was the first one in the bar when Maggie opened it. In fact, he wanted a key so he could open it for her on snowy mornings. Maggie heard the rushing water before she saw the flooding in the bar. Rooster fixed the pipe in the attic, but it burst again after he fixed it so Beau fixed it correctly.

questions.text: In "One of Those Nights", Beau told Joanne in a fire he would save his binoculars before he would save his boys.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Joanne borrowed the binoculars for a Disney cruise she and her daughter and granddaughter were joining. When Joanne brought them she mentioned that Beau's binoculars were like his third son. In a fire, Beau told her he would save the binoculars before the boys.

questions.text: What did Beau bring to Heather that belonged to the boys in "Find Out Who Your Friends Are"?
questions.explanation:
Rocking horse.

	Beau's grandfather made the rocking horse. Beau told Heather and Mary that Colt tried to runaway on the rocking horse. He stayed in the driveway for three hours rocking on it. Beau gave it to Heather and reminded her that she is a Bennett now that she's carrying his grandchild.

questions.text: In "I Didn't Ask and She Didn't Say", what was the name of the teacher who Abby introduced to Heather and later Heather began to date?
questions.explanation:
Paul.

	Abby introduced Heather to Paul who was a math teacher at the high school. Colt became jealous because he didn't want Heather dating anyone while she was carrying his baby. Heather ended up dumping him when he began talking to much about algebra.
